Detailed Description

Abstract base class for all the concrete implementation classes that provide different implementations for the ACE_Asynch_Write_Stream class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual int ACE_Asynch_Write_Stream_Impl::write (  ACE_Message_Block &    message_block,
size_t    bytes_to_write,
const void *    act,
int    priority,
int    signal_number
)  [pure virtual]
 

This starts off an asynchronous write. Upto <bytes_to_write> will be written from the <message_block>.

Reimplemented in ACE_Asynch_Write_File_Impl, ACE_POSIX_Asynch_Write_Stream, ACE_POSIX_Asynch_Write_File, ACE_WIN32_Asynch_Write_Stream, and ACE_WIN32_Asynch_Write_File.

virtual int ACE_Asynch_Write_Stream_Impl::writev (  ACE_Message_Block &    message_block,
size_t    bytes_to_write,
const void *    act,
int    priority,
int    signal_number
)  [pure virtual]
 

Same as above but with gather support, through chaining of composite message blocks using the continuation field.

Reimplemented in ACE_Asynch_Write_File_Impl, ACE_WIN32_Asynch_Write_Stream, and ACE_WIN32_Asynch_Write_File.
